== Practical information ==
The meeting will be held in the Talent Garden (TAG) Innovation School in Glasnevin Dublin 9 - https://dublin.talentgarden.org. Talent Garden is located on the campus next to the headquarters of Met Éireann which has an easy-to-recognise pyramid-type structure.
See map below - it's possible to enter via the front of DCU Alpha or alternatively to follow the route that google maps will give you. If you enter through DCU Alpha on Old Finglas Road, follow the signs for Talent Garden (TAG).

== Transport ==

'''From Dublin Airport'''

A taxi to Talent Garden from Dublin Airport will cost €20-25, while a taxi to the city centre will cost approximately €25, and take 25 minutes. A shuttle bus (number 747) runs from Dublin Airport to the city centre (https://airlinkexpress.ie/). A one way ticket is €7 at the airport or €6 online, and takes 30-40 minutes. There are no direct public transport routes between the airport and Talent Garden, but there are a number of direct options from the city centre which we recommend (see From Dublin City Centre). Alternatively, it is possible to take Dublin Bus number 41 (in the direction of ‘Abbey Street’) or 16 (in the direction of ‘Ballinteer’) from Dublin Airport to the Skylon Hotel. From here, you can take the number 11 bus from the ‘Drumcondra, Home Farm Road’ stop (in the direction of ‘Wadelai
Park’) to the ‘Ballymun Road’ stop which will bring you within a 5-10 minute walk of the venue. Walking from the Skylon Hotel to Talent Garden takes about 20 minutes (1.6 km).

'''From Dublin City Centre'''

Talent Garden is easily accessed from the city centre by Dublin Bus (https://www.dublinbus.ie/). The stop nearest Talent Garden is "Glasnevin Hill, Met Office", which is directly opposite our HQ building. From the city centre (e.g.Westmoreland Street), take either bus 83 or 83a in the direction of ‘Harristown’ to the ‘Glasnevin Hill, Met Office’ stop. Alternatively, Bus 9 (in direction of ‘Charlestown’) and 4 (in the direction of Talent Garden. A single trip will cost €3; only coins are excepted and change is not provided. Alternatively, when you arrive at the airport, buy a Leap Card. These are integrated transport cards used on the majority of public transport around Dublin. More information about the cards and where they can bought can be found at https://www.leapcard.ie/Home/index.html. A taxi from the city centre to Talent Garden will take 15-20 minutes and cost €20 approximately.


'''Taxi back to Dublin Airport after the meeting'''
If you require a tax to Dublin Airport after the meeting we suggest that you book this a few hours in advance. Here are the numbers of a few nearby taxi companies: Finglas taxis +353-1-8642222 and Autobahn cabs +353-1-8424444.
